00005 #include <Carbon/Carbon.h>
00006 #include "PVPhysics.h"

00008 const Vector3 PVPhysics::GRAVITY = Vector3(0, -9.81, 0);
00009 const float PVPhysics::DAMPING = 0.85;
00010

00012 {
00013 }

00019 void PVPhysics::simulate(std::map<std::string, PVNode*>& objectMap, std::vector<PVNode*>& balls, int numberOfFlyingBalls, float time)
00020 {
00021  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfFlyingBalls; ++i)
00022  {
00023   move(balls.at(i), time);
00024   //std::cout << time << std::endl;
00025  }
00026  
00027  collisionDetection(objectMap, balls, numberOfFlyingBalls);
00028 }
00029 
00030 void PVPhysics::move(PVNode* ball, float time)
00031 {
00032  double deltaT = time;
00033  if (deltaT < 0.0)
00034  {
00035   deltaT = 0.2;
00036  }
00037  ball->setVelocity( ball->getVelocity() += ball->getAcceleration() * deltaT);
00038  ball->setPosition( ball->getPosition() += (ball->getVelocity() * deltaT) + (ball->getAcceleration() * (deltaT * deltaT)/2));
00039  
00040  if (ball->getAcceleration() != GRAVITY) 
00041  {
00042   ball->setAcceleration(GRAVITY);
00043  }
00044        
00045 }
00046 
00047 void PVPhysics::collisionDetection(std::map<std::string, PVNode*>& objectMap, std::vector<PVNode*>& balls, int numberOfFlyingBalls)
00048 {
00049  std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itArena = objectMap.find("arena");
00050  std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itWall = objectMap.find("wall");
00051  std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itP1 = objectMap.find("p1");
00052  std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itP2 = objectMap.find("p2");
00053  std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itCannon = objectMap.find("kanone");
00054 
00055  
00056  for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= numberOfFlyingBalls; ++i) {
00057   collisionWithArena(itArena->second, balls.at(i));
00058   collisionWithWall(itWall->second, balls.at(i));
00059   collisionWithCannon(itCannon->second, balls.at(i));
00060   collisionWithPillar(itP1->second, balls.at(i));
00061   collisionWithPillar(itP2->second, balls.at(i));
00062   for( int j = (i+1); j <= numberOfFlyingBalls; j++ )
00063   {
00064    collisionWithBall( balls.at(i), balls.at(j) );
00065   }
00066   
00067  }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void PVPhysics::collisionWithArena(PVNode *arena, PVNode *ball)
00071 {
00072  float arenaRadius = (arena->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize()).x / 2;
00073  float arenaHeight = arena->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize().y;
00074  float ballRadius = (ball->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize()).x / 2;
00075  float toleranz = ballRadius + ballRadius;
00076  Vector3 ballPosition = ball->getPosition();
00077  
00078  if (ballPosition.length() >= (arenaRadius + toleranz)) return;
00079  
00080  if (ballPosition.y >= arenaHeight) return;
00081  
00082  if (ballPosition.length() > (arenaRadius - toleranz)) 
00083  {
00084 //  std::cout << "arenaRadius = " << arenaRadius-toleranz<<std::endl;
00085 //  std::cout << "ballPosition.length = " << ballPosition.length()<<std::endl;
00086 
00087   handleCollision(arena, ball);
00088   return;
00089  }
00090  
00091  if ((ballPosition.y - ballRadius) < 0) 
00092  {
00093   handleCollisionWithGround(arena, ball);
00094   return;
00095  }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void PVPhysics::collisionWithWall(PVNode *wall, PVNode *ball)
00099 {
00100  AxisAlignedBox box1 = wall->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB();
00101  AxisAlignedBox box2 = ball->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB();
00102  
00103  
00104  if(box1.intersects(box2))
00105  {
00106   Vector3 upperLeftHole = wall->getPosition() + Vector3(-10.0, 11.0, 0);
00107   Vector3 lowerRichtHole = wall->getPosition() + Vector3(10.0, 6.0, 0.0);
00108 
00109   if ( ((ball->getPosition() - upperLeftHole).length() > 3.2) &&
00110    ((ball->getPosition() - lowerRichtHole).length() > 3.2))
00111   {
00112    handleCollision(wall, ball);
00113   }
00114  }
00115 }
00116 
00117 void PVPhysics::collisionWithCannon(PVNode *kanone, PVNode *ball)
00118 {
00119 }
00120 
00121 void PVPhysics::collisionWithBall(PVNode *ball1, PVNode *ball2)
00122 {
00123  AxisAlignedBox box1 = ball1->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB();
00124  AxisAlignedBox box2 = ball2->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB();
00125  
00126  if(box1.intersects(box2))
00127  {
00128   handleCollisionWithBall(ball1, ball2);
00129  }
00130 
00131 }
00132 
00133 void PVPhysics::handleCollision(PVNode *node, PVNode *ball)
00134 {
00135  Vector3 normale = ball->getNormal();
00136  Vector3 ballVelocity = ball->getVelocity();
00137  
00138  ballVelocity = ballVelocity.reflect(normale);
00139  
00140  Vector3 normalizedVelocity = ballVelocity.normalisedCopy();
00141  //float length = ball->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize().length();
00142  ball->setPosition(ball->getPosition() + normalizedVelocity);// * length);
00143 
00144  ball->setVelocity(ballVelocity * DAMPING);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void PVPhysics::handleCollisionWithGround(PVNode * ground, PVNode *ball)
00148 {
00149  Vector3 normale = Vector3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00150  Vector3 ballVelocity = ball->getVelocity();
00151  
00152  ballVelocity = ballVelocity.reflect(normale);
00153  
00154  Vector3 normalizedVelocity = ballVelocity.normalisedCopy();
00155  //float length = ball->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize().length();
00156  ball->setPosition(ball->getPosition() + normalizedVelocity);// * length);
00157  
00158  //ball->setPosition(ball->getPosition() + ballVelocity);// * length);
00159  ball->setVelocity(ballVelocity * DAMPING);
00160 }
00161 
00162 void PVPhysics::handleCollisionWithBall(PVNode *ball1, PVNode *ball2)
00163 {
00164  //zwei bälle, gleiche behandlung jeweils
00165  Vector3 velocityBall1 = ball1->getVelocity();
00166  Vector3 velocityBall2 = ball2->getVelocity();
00167  
00168  //bälle reflektieren um die velocity des anderen (getrickst: velocity als normale)
00169  velocityBall1 = velocityBall1.reflect(velocityBall2.normalisedCopy());
00170  velocityBall2 = velocityBall2.reflect(ball1->getVelocity().normalisedCopy());
00171  
00172  Vector3 normalizedVelocity = velocityBall1.normalisedCopy();
00173  float length = ball1->getSceneNode()->_getWorldAABB().getSize().length();
00174  ball1->setPosition( ball1->getPosition() + normalizedVelocity*length );
00175  
00176  ball1->setVelocity( velocityBall1 * DAMPING );
00177  ball2->setVelocity( velocityBall2 * DAMPING );
00178  
00179 }
00180 
00181 void PVPhysics::collisionWithPillar(PVNode* pillar, PVNode* ball){
00182  
00183  collisionWithWall(pillar, ball);
00184 }
